name: yep

yes: "Do I press this button?" "Yep, that's right." It cost a billion dollars. Yep, you heard me. One billion dollars. You have to sign up - yep, another subscription service - through their website.
More examplesFewer examples"Are you coming?" "Yep.""Yep," he said. "That's the one."Yep, everything's fine.His name is Howard. Yep, Howard."Shall we go?" "Yep, I'm ready."

(spelled the way it is often spoken) yes: "Should we go?" "Yep."
